title: System classes of the "Administration" module

System classes of the "Administration" module
For the correct functioning of the System, the following system classes are used under the "Administration" module:
Permissions type [SYS_ACCESS_TYPE]
Purpose
: a directory that stores a list of permissions for the object type. Permissions management allows the Administrator to set up rules for the availability of information for employees.
No user instances can be added.
Attribute composition
of the "Permissions" type contains the attributes of the
«Object»
parent type and the attributes shown in the following table:
Name
Field name
Value type
Purpose
Restrictions
System identifier
IDENT
String
Storing the identifier
Filled in manually
Privilege (Permissions)  [SYS_ACC_ACE_TYPE]
Purpose
: a directory that stores a list of available privileges for users (access groups) in the System. The differentiation of
permissions
to different object types is regulated by the "Privileges by object types (System permissions)" type [SYS_ACC_ACE_TYPE_LINK].
Used to grant permissions in an "objectAccess" visual.
No user instances can be added.
Attribute composition
of the "Privilege (System permissions)" type contains the attributes of the
«Object»
parent type and the attributes shown in the following table:
Name
Field name
Value type
Purpose
Restrictions
Mask
MASK
Integer
Storing the permissions mask
Filled in manually
System identifier
IDENT
String
Storing the identifier
Filled in manually
Security policy [SYS_PASSWORD_POLICY]
Purpose
: basic type for storing security policy data configured in the System.
For this system class, a child type can be created. This may lead to a System error when creating instances of the inherited type.
Attribute composition
of the "Security policy" type contains the attributes of the
«Object»
parent type and the attributes shown in the following table:
Name
Field name
Value type
Purpose
Restrictions
Block user in the absence of logins to the System
SYS_BLOCK_IF
_INACTIVE
Boolean
Storing a sign of blocking a user in the absence of logins to the system
Filled in manually. Activates the field "Acceptable period of absence of logins, days".
Block the account in case of unsuccessful login attempts
SYS_BLOCK_IF
_WRONG_PWD
Boolean
Storing a sign of blocking a user in case of failed login attempts
Filled in manually. Activates the "Number of allowed failed attempts" field.
Acceptable period of absence of logins, days.
SYS_MAX
_INACTIVITY_DAYS
Integer
Storing the number of days of no logins to block the user
Filled in manually. The days start counting from the date of the last authorization. If the user has never passed the authorization procedure, then the date of the last activity is considered to be the date of the user’s data change.
Set the frequency of mandatory password change
SYS_PWD_CHANGE
_REQUIRED
Boolean
Storing a sign of whether a periodic password change is mandatory
Filled in manually. Activates the "Password Validity period, days" field.
Number of allowed failed attempts
SYS_MAX_WRONG
_PWD_COUNT
Integer
Storing the number of failed login attempts to block the user
Filled in manually. With this option is active, after unsuccessful authorization, the user will receive a notification containing the number of remaining entry attempts before the account will be blocked
Password validity period, days
SYS_PWD
_DURATION_DAYS
Integer
Storing the user’s password validity period
Filled in manually.	The day count starts from the last date of password change. If the password hasn’t been changed previously, the count starts after signs of the password policy activation. When this option is active, the user that has exceeded the allowed number of days without authorization in the system will get a notification when logging in.
Sign of activity
IS_ACTIVE
Boolean
Storing a sign of password policy activity
Filled in manually. Only one password policy can be active for an application. If you try to save another password policy with this parameter, the system will notify you of the presence of an already active password policy and offer to replace it.
System identifier
IDENT
String
Storing the Password policy identifier
Filled in manually
Access group [SYS_SEC_GROUP]
Purpose
: the role group determines the user’s permissions to documents, tasks and other objects of the System, as well as functionality when working with them.
The base type is a child type of "Security subject" [SYS_SEC_SUBJECT].
Attribute composition
of the "Access Group" type, in addition to the attributes of the
«Object»
type, contains its own attributes and attributes inherited from the "Security Subject" type [SYS_SEC_SUBJECT]:
Name
Field name
Value type
Purpose
Restrictions
System identifier
IDENT
String
Storing the group identifier
Filled in manually. The identifier of access groups cannot be repeated.
Configured groups
ID_174620
Custom
Storing access groups that the access group belongs to
Filled in manually
Order
ORD
Integer
Storing the employee ordinal number
Filled in automatically with the instance code.
Structural group
IS_STRUCTURAL
Boolean
Storing a structural group attribute
Filled in manually. When an object is created by a user who is a member of a group with the specified attribute, the System checks all the groups that the user is a member of and gives permissions to groups with the attribute.
The set of permissions is taken from the default permissions settings for structural groups.
Credential [SYS_CREDENTIAL]
Purpose
: Credentials used for user authentication in the System.
Attribute composition
: The "Credential" type includes attributes of the
“Object”
parent type and attributes listed in the following table:
Name
Field name
Value type
Purpose
Restrictions
Lock user
IS_LOCKED
Boolean
Stores the account lock status
Filled in manually.
Last login date
LAST_LOGIN_DATE
Date and time
Stores the date and time of the user’s last login to the System
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Username
IDENT
String
Stores the login
Filled in automatically with an option for manual adjustment. The login must be unique.
User
PROVIDER_USER_ID
Object referencing the "User" type [SYS_USER]
Stores the user account
Filled in manually.
Identification provider
IDENTITY_PROVIDER
Object referencing the "Identification Provider" type [SYS_IDENTITY_PROVIDER]
Stores the identity provider
Filled in manually.
User [SYS_USER]
Purpose
: storage of accounts on the basis of which the System service works (audit, evaluation of permissions and prohibitions), which allows you to work in the System under different users.
Creation of individual access accounts allows users to authorize and log in to the System interface. The System interface will display the objects and commands for a specific user, eliminating the possibility of performing actions outside the user’s area of responsibility.
For On-Premise solutions, there is
anonymous access
(viewing and limited work in the system of an unregistered user).
For this system class, a child type can be created. Although, there is no possibility to configure the application type when logging in via SSO or self-registration.
Attribute composition
Attribute composition of the "User" type, in addition to the attributes of the
«Object»
type, contains its own attributes and attributes inherited from the "Security Subject" type [SYS_SEC_SUBJECT]:
Name
Field name
Value type
Purpose
Restrictions
Login
IDENT
String
Storing the User’s login
Filled in automatically, can be edited manually. The login cannot be repeated for Users.
Configured groups
ID_174620
Custom
Storing access groups that the User belongs to
Filled in automatically with the "All users" value with the possibility of manual adjustment. At the moment of saving the changes, his effective permissions are automatically recalculated.
Order
ORD
Integer
Storing the employee ordinal number
Filled in automatically with the instance code.
Hook tokens
HOOK_TOKENS
Child object of "Hook user token" type [HOOK_USER_TOKEN]
Storing User tokens
Filled in manually. Can be used for configuring ETL.
Blocking user
IS_LOCKED
Boolean
Storing User status
Filled in manually. Blocks login for the end user.
Date of password change
PWD_STAMP
Date and time
Storing the date and time of the last User password change
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Expiration date
EXPIRY_DATE
Date and time
Storing the account expiration date and time
Filled in manually
Last login date
LAST_LOGIN_DATE
Date and time
Storing the date and time of the last User login
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
The number of failed password entries
FAILED_LOGIN
_COUNT
Integer2
Storing the total number of failed User password entries
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Change password
PWD_CHANGE
Boolean
Storing a sign about the need to change the User’s password at the first login
Filled in manually. This sign obliges users to change password when log in for the first time.
Automatically marked "Yes" when the user is unblocked.
Password
CHANGE_PWD
Custom
Storing the User Account password
Filled in manually. The password must meet the following requirements:
* consist of Latin letters and/ or numbers;
* consist of at least 6 characters.
Password
PWD
String
Storing the User Account password
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Related users
SYS_LINKED
_USERS
Child object of "Related users" type [SYS_USER_LINKED]
Storing data about related users
Filled in manually. The functionality allows connecting users to each other, with specifying the main one among them. When creating an object under a user that other users (multiuser) are associated with.
By default, the object will be created under the main user.
Employee
EMP_ID
An object referring to the "Personal data" type [SYS_EMPLOYEE]
Storing a reference to an employee in the System
Filled in manually. Employee cannot be repeated for Users.
Registration confirmation is required
CONFORM
_REQUIRED
Boolean
Storing a sign of the need to confirm registration
Filled in manually. Regulates the need for confirming registration.
Employee  [SYS_EMP]
Purpose
: type for ensuring the work of
users in the System
.
Intended for storing data about
employees of the system
(tightly connected with the "User" type [SYS_USER]).
Parent type is "Personal Data" [SYS_EMPLOYEE], a type that defines unique properties for application inherited object types.
The system has another child type from "Personal Data" [SYS_PBX_EMPLOYEE], which is designed for
integration with telephony
.
Attribute composition
of the "Employee" type, in addition to the attributes of the
«Object»
type, contains its own attributes and inherited attributes from the "Personal Data" type [SYS_EMPLOYEE], presented in the following table:
Name
Field name
Value type
Purpose
Restrictions
E-MAIL
EMAIL
String
Storing information about the Employee’s e-mail address
Can be filled in automatically when setting up self-registration in the System. When entering manually, confirmation by mail is required. Employees cannot have repeated e-mails.
E-MAIL confirmed
EMAIL_CONFIRMED
Boolean
Storing E-mail status information
Filled in automatically when the E-mail is confirmed.
Skype
SKYPE
String
Storing information about Employee’s Skype information
Filled in manually
Blocking an employee
IS_LOCKED
Boolean
Storing information about blocking an Employee in the System
Filled in manually. Regulates filtering in the registry of employee tasks, when selecting an employee in substitutions, when selecting a person responsible for a task.
Working time schedule
WORKDAY
_SCHEDULE_ID
An object referring to the "Employee’s Working Time Schedule" type [SYS_EMP_SCHEDULE
]
Storing a reference to the Working Time Schedule
Filled in manually. Can be used when working with the getWorkDatesBetween function
Birthday
BIRTHDAY
Date
Storing the Employee’s date of birth
Filled in manually
Position
JOB_POS_ID
An object referring to the "Position" type [SPR_JOB_POS]
Storing an Employee’s position
Filled in manually
Prohibit sending notifications to the mail
BAN_SEND
_NOTIFICATIONS
Boolean
Storing a sign of a ban on sending notifications to an Employee’s email
Filled in manually
First name
FIRST_NAME
String
Storing the Employee’s first name
Can be filled in automatically when setting up self-registration in the System.
Language
LOCALE_ID
An object referring to the "Language scheme" type [SYS_LANG_SCHEMA
]
Storing the Employee’s language
Filled in automatically, can be edited manually.
City
CITY_ID
An object referring to the "City" type [SYS_CITY]
Storing an Employee’s city
Filled in manually
Phone number confirmed
PHONE
_CONFIRMED
Boolean
Storing phone status information
Filled in automatically when the phone number is confirmed.
Middle name
PATRONYMIC
String
Storing the Employee’s middle name
Filled in manually
Department
EMP_ORG_ID
An object referring to the "Department" type [SYS_ORG_STR]
Storing the Employee’s department
The "Whole organizational structure" is filled in automatically with the possibility of manual adjustments. Can be used when setting up the curability matrix.
Gender
SEX_ID
An object referring to the "Gender" type [SEX]
Storing the Employee’s gender
Filled in manually
Country
COUNTRY_ID
An object referring to the "Country" type [SYS_COUNTRY]
Storing the Employee’s country
Filled in automatically based on the IP address with the possibility of manual adjustment. Regulates the format of dates and numbers.
Phone
PHONE
String
Storing an Employee’s phone number
When entering manually, confirmation is required.
Last name
SURNAME
String
Storing the Employee’s last name
Filled in manually
Employee’s photo
SYS_IMAGE
An object referring to the "File" type [FS_FILE]
Storing Employee’s photo
Filled in manually via an "Image" visual.
Time zone
TIME_ZONE
Object referring to the "Time zone" type [SYS_TIME_ZONE]
Storing the Employee’s time zone
Filled in manually. Regulates the calculation of deadlines, notifications, etc.
Update system
Purpose
: Object type containing created and installed
updates
via the CI/CD method.
Attribute composition
of the "Update for transfer via CI/CD" type [SYS_CI_CD_BASE_UPDATE]
The attribute composition
includes attributes of the
“Object”
parent type and attributes listed in the following table:
Name
Field name
Value type
Purpose
Restrictions
UUID
SYS_OBJ_UUID
String
Stores the UUID
Automatically generated by the system.
Description
NOTE
String
Stores the update description
Filled in automatically by the system.
Update batch file
SYS_UPDATE_FILE_ID
Object referencing the "File" type [FS_FILE]
Stores the update package file
Filled in automatically by the system.
Attribute composition
of the "Update received via CI/CD" type [SYS_CI_CD_RECEIVED]
*The attribute composition
, in addition to the attributes of the
“Object”
type, includes inherited attributes from the "Update for transfer via CI/CD" type [SYS_CI_CD_BASE_UPDATE] and its own attributes listed in the following table:
Name
Field name
Value type
Purpose
Restrictions
Date of last installation
SYS_CI_CD_INSTALL_DATE
Date and time
Stores the last check/installation date
Filled in automatically by the system.
Links to update settings
SYS_CI_CD_SOURCE_ID
Object referencing the "Settings for getting updates" type [SYS_CI_CD_SOURCE]
Stores the reference to settings
Filled in automatically by the system.
Update status
SYS_CI_CD_RES_STATUS_ID
Object referencing the "Directory. Result of installation via CI/CD" type [SYS_CI_CD_RES_STATUS]
Stores the update status
Filled in automatically by the system.
Attribute composition
of the "Update created via CI/CD" type [SYS_CI_CD_PUBLISHED]
The attribute composition
, in addition to the attributes of the
“Object”
type, includes inherited attributes from the "Update for transfer via CI/CD" type [SYS_CI_CD_BASE_UPDATE] and its own attributes listed in the following table:
Name
Field name
Value type
Purpose
Restrictions
Update status
SYS_CI_CD_STATUS_ID
Object referencing the "Status of update via CI/CD" type [SYS_CI_CD_STATUS]
Stores the update status
Filled in automatically by the system.
Audit
Audit. Access group [SYS_AU_SEC_GROUP]
Purpose
: a type for recording changes in the
role group
.
No user instances can be added.
Attribute composition
of the "Audit. Access group" type in addition to the attributes of the
"Primitive object"
type, includes its own attributes and attributes inherited from the
"Primitive object with a surrogate key"
type:
Name
Field name
Value type
Purpose
Restrictions
Last modified date
LAST_MODIFIED_DATE
Date and time
Stores the date of the last modification of the access group
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Create date
CREATE_DATE
Date and time
Stores the creation date of the access group
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Identifier
IDENT
String
Stores the identifier of the access group
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Mass subject
SYS_MASS_ENTITY
Boolean
Stores the sign of a mass subject
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Name
NAME
String
Stores the name of the access group
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Configured groups
ID_174620
Custom
Stores configured groups
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Office
ORG_ID
Object referencing the "Office" type [SYS_ORG_STR]
Stores the department of the employee who made changes to the access group
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Last modified by (user)
LAST_MODIFIED_USER_ID
Object referencing the "User" type [SYS_USER]
Stores the user who made the last changes to the access group
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
User
USER_ID
Object referencing the "User" type [SYS_USER]
Stores the user who created the access group
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Order
ORD
Integer
Stores the order number of the group
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
System object
IS_SYSTEM
Boolean
Stores the indicator of a system object
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Last modified by (employee)
LAST_MODIFIED_EMP_ID
Object referencing the "Personal data" type [SYS_EMPLOYEE]
Stores the employee who made the last modifications to the access group
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Created by
CREATED_EMP_ID
Object referencing the "Personal data" type [SYS_EMPLOYEE]
Stores the employee who created the access group
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Status
STATUS
Boolean
Stores the status of the object
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Structural group
IS_STRUCTURAL
Boolean
Stores the indicator of a structural group
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Audit. Action [SYS_AU_ACTION]
Purpose
: a type for recording custom actions performed in the System.
No user instances can be added.
Attribute composition
of the "Audit. Action" type, in addition to the attributes of the
"Primitive object"
type, includes its own attributes and attributes inherited from the
"Primitive object with a surrogate key"
type:
Name
Field name
Value type
Purpose
Restrictions
Application version
APPLICATION_VERSION
String
Stores the user’s application version
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Date
STAMP
Date and time
Stores the date and time of the action performed on the object
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Child object
SUB_OBJ_ID
Object referencing the "Object" type [SYS_OBJECT]
Stores a reference to the child object
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
User ID
USER_IDENT
String
Stores the identifier of the user who performed the action
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Change
CHANGE_ID
Object referencing the "Audit. Change" type [SYS_AU_CHANGE_VIEW]
Stores the performed change
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Comment
NOTE
String
Stores additional information
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Node name
NODE_NAME
String
Stores the node name
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Child object name
SUB_OBJ_NAME
String
Stores the name of the child object
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Object name
OBJ_NAME
String
Stores the name of the object
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Department name
ORG_NAME
String
Stores the name of the department of the employee who performed the action
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Name of the employee
EMPLOYEE_NAME
String
Stores the name of the employee who performed the action
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Object
OBJ_ID
Object referencing the "Audit object" type [SYS_AU_OBJECT]
Stores a reference to the object
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Office
ORG_ID
Object referencing the "Office" type [SYS_ORG_STR]
Stores the department of the employee who performed the action on the object
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
User
USER_ID
Object referencing the "Audit. User" type [SYS_AU_USER]
Stores the user who performed the action on the object
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
User with rights to perform the action
SYS_USER_WITH_RIGHTS
Object referencing the "User" type [SYS_USER]
Stores the user with permissions to execute the action on the object
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Session
AU_SESSION_ID
Object referencing the "Audit. Session" type [SYS_AU_SESSION]
Stores information about the session during which the action was performed
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Employee
EMPLOYEE_ID
Object referencing the "Employee" type [SYS_EMP]
Stores the employee who performed the action on the object
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Action type
ACTION_TYPE_ID
Object referencing the "Audit. Action type" type [SYS_AU_ACTION_TYPE]
Stores a reference to the type of action performed
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Event success
SYS_AU_IS_SUCCESS
Boolean
Stores the indicator of event success
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Audit. Change [SYS_AU_CHANGE_VIEW]
Purpose
: Type for recording data changes made by the user in the System.
No user instances can be added.
Attribute composition
of the "Audit. Change" type, in addition to the attributes of the
"Primitive object"
type, contains its own attributes and attributes inherited from the
"Primitive object with a surrogate key"
type:
Name
Field name
Value type
Purpose
Restrictions
Date
STAMP
Date and time
Stores the date and time of the change
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Object name
OBJ_NAME
String
Stores the name of the modified object
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Object
OBJ_ID
Object referencing the "Audit object" type [SYS_AU_OBJECT]
Stores the reference to the modified object
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Session
AU_SESSION_ID
Object referencing the "Audit. Session" type [SYS_AU_SESSION]
Stores the session during which the change occurred
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Audit. Changing the access group [SYS_AU_ACC_GRP_CHANGE]
Purpose
: Type for recording changes to access groups and user memberships within them.
No user instances can be added.
Attribute composition
of the "Audit. Changing the access group" type, in addition to the attributes of the
"Primitive object"
type, contains its own attributes and attributes inherited from the
"Primitive object with a surrogate key"
type:
Name
Field name
Value type
Purpose
Restrictions
Group
GROUP_ID
Object referencing the "Audit. Access group" type [SYS_AU_SEC_GROUP]
Stores the access group
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Date
STAMP
Date and time
Stores the date and time of the change
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Changes
CHANGE_ID
Object referencing the "Audit. Change access permissions" type [SYS_AU_ACC_CHANGE]
Stores the change in access permissions
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Office of the employee committing the action
MODIFY_ORG_STR
Object referencing the "Audit. Office" type [SYS_AU_ORG_STR]
Stores the office of the employee who modified the access group
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
User
USER_ID
Object referencing the "Audit. User" type [SYS_AU_USER]
Stores the user whose access group was changed
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
User committing the action
MODIFY_USER_ID
Object referencing the "Audit. User" type [SYS_AU_USER]
Stores the user who performed the change in the access group
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Token of inclusion in the group
GRP_INCLUDE
Boolean
Stores the inclusion flag for the access group
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Employee committing the action
MODIFY_EMP_ID
Object referencing the "Audit. Employee" type [SYS_AU_EMP]
Stores the employee who performed the change in the access group
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Audit. Changing the attribute value [SYS_AU_CHANGE_TYPE_ATTR]
Purpose
: Type for recording changes to attribute values in the System.
No user instances can be added.
Attribute composition
of the "Audit. Changing the attribute value" type, in addition to the attributes of the
"Primitive object"
type, contains its own attributes and attributes inherited from the
"Primitive object with a surrogate key"
type:
Name
Field name
Value type
Purpose
Restrictions
Type attribute
TYPE_ATTR_ID
Object referencing the "Audit object" type [SYS_AU_OBJECT]
Stores the reference to the modified attribute type
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Date
STAMP
Date and time
Stores the date and time of the change
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Identifiers added
ADDED_IDS
String
Stores the added identifiers
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
User identifier
USER_IDENT
String
Stores the user identifier
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Change
CHANGE_ID
Object referencing the "Audit. Change" type [SYS_AU_CHANGE_VIEW]
Stores the reference to the change
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Comment
NOTE
String
Stores additional information
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
User comment
USER_COMMENT
String
Stores the user comment
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Attribute name
ATTR_NAME
String
Stores the attribute name
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Object name
OBJ_NAME
String
Stores the object name
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Office name
ORG_NAME
String
Stores the name of the office of the employee who made the change
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Employee name
EMPLOYEE_NAME
String
Stores the employee who made the change
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
ID value
NEW_VAL_ID
String
Stores the new identifier
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
New name meaning
NEW_VAL_NAME
String
Stores the new name
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Updated IDs
UPDATED_IDS
String
Stores the updated identifiers
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Object
OBJ_ID
Object referencing the "Audit object" type [SYS_AU_OBJECT]
Stores the reference to the object
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Office
ORG_ID
Object referencing the "Office" type [SYS_ORG_STR]
Stores the office of the employee who made the change
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
User
USER_ID
Object referencing the "Audit. User" type [SYS_AU_USER]
Stores the user who made the change
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Employee
EMPLOYEE_ID
Object referencing the "Employee" type [SYS_EMP]
Stores the employee who made the change
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Deleted IDs
REMOVED_IDS
String
Stores the removed identifiers
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Audit. Changing the access permissions mask [SYS_AU_ACC_MASK_CHANGE]
Purpose
: Type for recording changes to access masks for objects in the System.
No user instances can be added.
Attribute composition
of the "Audit. Changing the access permissions mask" type, in addition to the attributes of the
"Primitive object"
type, contains its own attributes and attributes inherited from the
"Primitive object with a surrogate key"
type:
Name
Field name
Value type
Purpose
Restrictions
Date
STAMP
Date and time
Stores the date and time of the change to the access mask
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
Change
CHANGE_ID
Object referencing the "Audit. Change access permissions" type [SYS_AU_ACC_CHANGE]
Stores the change
Filled in automatically with data from the server.
New access mask
NEW_PERM_MASK
Integer
Stores the new access mask
